title: Why Antonio Pigafetta wrote the first voyage round the world? - Quora

response.answer_text: He was a member of Magellan’s expedition! He completed the voyage after Magellan’s death. He wrote and published his account of that expedition so that those who were interested in the expedition could read about it. He was also writing for prosterity. His record is still of interest to historians and a lot of other people.
